Results.Plot: The magical action-adventures of a teenage girl who learns of her destiny as the legendary warrior Sailor Moon and must band together with the other Sailor Scouts to defend the Earth and Galaxy.
Results.Stars: Susan Roman, Jill Frappier, Katie Griffin, Ron Rubin

Results.Title: Ninja Scroll
Results.Plot: A vagabond swordsman is aided by a beautiful ninja girl and a crafty spy in confronting a demonic clan of killers - with a ghost from his past as their leader - who are bent on overthrowing the Tokugawa Shogunate.
Results.Stars: Yoshiaki Kawajiri, Kôichi Yamadera, Emi Shinohara, Takeshi Aono, Osamu Saka

Results.Title: Gantz: O
Results.Plot: After being brutally murdered in a subway station, a teen boy awakens to find himself resurrected by a strange computer named Gantz, and forced to fight a large force of invading aliens in Osaka.
Results.Stars: Yasushi Kawamura, Kei'ichi Sato, Daisuke Ono, Mao Ichimichi, Tomohiro Kaku, Saori Hayami
